StoryText: I'm playing in a school basketball game in front of all my classmates and I can feel my shorts are sliding down.
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Just ignore it and keep playing
Grab my shorts and hold on
Grab my shorts and run to the bathroom

OptionResult.Result: %FullName:NPC:1% passes the ball to me, my shorts fall down but I score the game-winning shot.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I'm so embarrassed, my shorts fell down in front of everyone! But I still caught the ball and made the game-winning shot. So, everyone is cheering me on for that and because they found it hilarious when my shorts dropped. I still just cannot believe it.

OptionResult.Result: I hold onto my shorts so they don't fall but %FullName:NPC:1% passes the ball to me and hits me in the face and we end up losing the game.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, %FullName:NPC:1% and everyone else at the school is mad at me, but I talk to %FullName:NPC:2% later on and explain to %Pron:2:2% what happened and %Pron:2:1% understands and comforts and consoles me. It does make me feel much better.

OptionResult.Result: I run to the bathroom in hopes I can fix my shorts but running off the court in the middle of the game loses us the game.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Everyone thinks I ran t the bathroom because I had to use the toilet and now they're all laughing at me and making fun of me. Even %FullName:NPC:2% thinks this is the case. I'm so embarrassed. I explain the situation to %FullName:NPC:1% and %Pron:1:1% gets it and tries to comfort me and make me feel better.
